mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE(COURSECODE, COURSENAME, STARTDATE, COURSECNT) VALUES ((SELECT 'C'|| LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(COURSECODE),2))+1),5,0) FROM COURSE), #{coursename}, #{startdate}, #{cnt})
